from IPython.display import Markdown
from tabulate import tabulate
from lib.my_excel_lib import get_tables
from lib.my_custom_lib import xls2md

tables = get_tables('tables/slr_logbook.xlsx')

Markdown(tabulate(
  xls2md(tables['journal_articles']),
  headers=['Seq','Source','Type','Title','E/I'],
  missingval=[''],
  maxcolwidths=[2, 8, 8, 76, 3],
  showindex=False,
  colalign=('right', 'left', 'left', 'left', 'center')))
